name: Flavortown (itch)
description:
Thanks to your late night cravings, you find yourself traveling to 
Flavortown on a cold, snackless night. Flavortown has become a very dangerous place at night. 
Most of the residents have evacuated. Pulling over in the outskirts of Flavortown 
and exiting your car, you set out to end your hunger. However, something doesn't 
feel right. It doesn't take long to realize you are not alone in this
unforgiving place. 

Can you kill your hunger and escape with your life or will your hunger kill you?

Updates

V 1.1
======================
* Improved enemy AI
* Fixed pink texture problem on items
* Added changes to the map
* 2 New modes
* New secrets
* Cheat mode at the title screen (you must type a word out on the keyboard)

Known issues
=====================

* The water sometimes looks weird at certain angles
* Enemy AI still isn't super perfect
